Maximum_Security_Block.title: Maximum Security Block
Maximum_Security_Block.text: The Maximum Security Block was built in XXXX and when it opened briefly held prisoners who had been involved in teh Mt Eden Prison riot of XXXX. The Block was also used as punishment for the children held at Lake Alice.

images.caption: Maximum security block at Lake Alice Psychiatric Hospital Marton. Photographer: Mr Cleal. Archway Item ID:R24730910 Archway Series Number:6539 Provenance: Transferred by agency AAQT Material Type: Digitised

Villas_9_-_18.title: Villas 9 - 18 - Eleven Bed Villas
Villas_9_-_18.text: The Eleven Bed villas were originally intended as intensive therapy units Dr Theodore Gray
